description:
Globalshala embraces collaborations and is venturing to make a good world better by extending affordable global educational opportunities and purposeful possibilities that will open up hopes and dreams of life long learners around the world! 

Inspired by United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (Goal 4: Education and Goal 5: Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment), we believe that Globalshala’s services, scholarships, and programs can create impact for the youth by ensuring equal and increased access to affordable and quality higher education that will maximize their potential to obtain quality jobs and sustainable economic growth.

We invite you to join us and help achieve through individual initiatives and partnerships.

updates.text:
Exciting News at GlobalShala!!!

We're thrilled to introduce our newest team member - UNO, a charming golden retriever mascot! 
UNO takes center stage, proudly donning a T-shirt featuring the number 4, a symbolic representation of the journey we've shared since the inception of GlobalShala. UNO not only signifies our commitment to unity and collaboration but also embodies the joy and excitement that learning brings.

A special shoutout to the incredibly talented artist Ashna Singh, who brought UNO to life with her creative brilliance! Your artistic touch has truly captured the essence of our brand and filled it with boundless energy.

UNO will be making appearances at our events, brightening them up, and spreading positive vibes. We believe our furry friend will not only bring smiles to our faces but also serve as a symbol of unity and teamwork.

Join us in welcoming UNO with open arms!

Subject: Join Our Team! GlobalShala is Hiring! 🌟
 
GlobalShala is excited to announce that we are hiring a University Relations Junior Associate to develop and implement our university marketing strategy. This full-time position welcomes applications from freshers eager to make an impact.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and execute marketing strategies.
Attend education expos and hiring fairs in India and abroad.
Conduct market research and build relationships with partner agencies.
Organize training seminars and support university staff visits.
Manage travel arrangements within budgets.

Requirements:
Strong drive and project management skills.
Excellent time-management and communication abilities.
Willingness to travel; experience in PR, Marketing, or Hospitality is a plus.
What We Offer:
Work-from-home flexibility
Reimbursed travel expenses
A supportive team environment
If you're passionate about marketing and eager to travel, we’d love to hear from you! To apply, share your resume with hr@globalshala.com or reach out directly on LinkedIn.
Let’s build the future together!
 
Best Regards,
 GlobalShala
 
#Hiring #GlobalShala #MarketingJobs #FreshersWelcome #JoinUs #WorkFromHome

🌟 Spotlight on Our Enrollment Officers: Transforming Futures Worldwide! 🌟

At Globally Recruit, we're committed to creating transformative experiences for students around the globe. Our exceptional enrolment officers are embarking on a journey to the USA, where they'll be at the forefront of Orientation Week at our prestigious partner universities. Their mission? To be the cornerstone of support for international students, ensuring their transition is seamless and inspiring.
Our Enrolment officers are not just mentors, they're architects of future success. By guiding students through their new academic and cultural landscapes, they’re fostering a welcoming, inclusive environment that resonates with possibility and hope. This incredible journey grants our team unparalleled global exposure, enriching their professional expertise and personal growth.
A heartfelt thank you to our Enrolment officers for their unwavering dedication and impactful work. Together, we're not just making a difference – we're transforming lives and building a brighter future!

From the technique to joyful work environments and goal-setting, Globalshala continuously devises strategies to boost employee engagement and satisfaction. We at Globalshala work on the mission to keep our relationships with employees strong, regardless of where we’re working. In order to develop a focused, driven, and technologically knowledgeable workforce, Globalshala held one day Virtual Marathon challenge for all of its staff members and interns on 26th November 2023. 

The motto was to encourage employees towards healthy lifestyle. The one completing the run with less time was considered as the "Wellness Champion" 🏆. At Globalshala, We believe The key to happiness is a good work-life balance.

Discovering the keys to increased productivity in the age of remote work! Globalshala consistently develops tactics to increase employee engagement and satisfaction, from implementing gamification and creating a happy work environment to defining SMART goals. In order to develop a focused, driven, and technologically knowledgeable workforce, Globalshala held a month-long “Step-Up Challenge” for all of its staff members and interns from October 9 to November 9, 2023. 
The motto was to boost physical fitness and improve mental well-being. The one with highest steps was considered as the "Wellness Champion" 🏆.
